definition: 100 ml/one-tenth of a peck/measure for dry grain equal to one-tenth of sheng 升 or liter, or one-hundredth dou 斗
to close/to join/to fit/to be equal to/whole/together/round (in battle)/conjunction (astronomy)/1st note of pentatonic scale/old variant of 盒[he2]
camp/barracks/battalion/to build/to operate/to manage/to strive for
public and private interests working together (idiom)

sentences.english: And joint state-private ownership was one way led to the goal.
sentences.chinese: “公私合營”即是達成這個任務的一種手段。

sentences.english: A foreign party is encouraged to deposit in the Bank of China any part of foreign exchange which he is entitled to remit abroad.
sentences.chinese: 鼓勵外國合營者將可匯出的外匯存入中國銀行。

sentences.english: Joint venture must implement the principle of economizing on land in their use of sites.
sentences.chinese: 合營企業使用場地，必須貫徹執行節約用地原則。

sentences.english: Whenever necessary, an equity joint venture may set up affiliated agencies outside China.
sentences.chinese: 合營企業需要時可在中國境外設立分支機構。

sentences.english: She consults with companies on strategic marketing plans that incorporate social and traditional media.
sentences.chinese: 她爲企業作社交媒體與傳統媒體整合營銷的顧問工作。

sentences.english: The chairman of the board is the legal representative of the joint venture.
sentences.chinese: 董事長是合營企業法定代表人。

sentences.english: Joint ventures shall not pay foreign currency or foreign exchange certificate to the aforesaid establishments.
sentences.chinese: 不得向合營企業收取外幣或外匯兌換券。

sentences.english: Integrated Marketing Communications is a new marketing means of communication, and its key is consumer-centered.
sentences.chinese: 整合營銷傳播是一種全新的營銷理念和傳播方法。

sentences.english: After the founding in 1953, Donglai bank into public-private partnership, Qingdao Branch.
sentences.chinese: 建國後1953年，東萊銀行併入公私合營青島分行。

sentences.english: Article 11 Joint ventures shall adopt debit and credit double entry bookkeeping.
sentences.chinese: 第十一條合營企業採用借貸複式記帳法。

sentences.english: It is a state-run enterprise set up in 1956.
sentences.chinese: 陽市醬油廠是1956年公私合營時組建的國營企業。

sentences.english: In a joint state-private enterprise, the private owner is more active as an operator.
sentences.chinese: 公私合營企業中，私方作爲企業的操作者更具主動性。

sentences.english: The joint venture company adopts RMB as its accounts keeping unit.
sentences.chinese: 合營公司採用人民幣爲記賬本位幣。

sentences.english: Joint ventures must implement the principle of economizing on land in their use of sites.
sentences.chinese: 合營企業使用場地，必須貫徹執行節約用地的原則。

sentences.english: In 1954 our firm became a joint state-privately operated one.
sentences.chinese: 1954年，我們公司改爲公私合營了。

sentences.english: I think we have to do has always been a resource in the integration of marketing.
sentences.chinese: 我想我們一直以來都是在做一個資源的整合營銷。

definition: remittance/funds paid to a bank account
